## SavedObjectTypeRegistry.isHidden() method

Returns the `hidden` property for given type, or `false` if the type is not registered.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isHidden(type: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
